bjyxquotes.quote: Zhan-ge! Didi ai ni!
Are you even human, Wang Yibo?

我与夏风皆过客，惟愿博肖揽星河。
I was a guest with the summer wind, I only wish for BoXiao to have a river of stars.
That's enough~ gouzaizai

并肩于雪山之巅。
Shoulder to shoulder upon the peak of a snowy mountain.

抄手河粉3+2
wontons noodles 3+2

yxh搬运biss
yxh banyun biss

博君一肖是真的。
BJYXSZD
Zhan-ge! I love you!

dd: What did Zhan-ge eat today? I asked you what you ate today.
gg: Wrong wrong wrong~ I was wrong~
dd: Ge, what did you eat today?
gg: Go away
dd: What did Xiao-laoshi eat today?
gg: Go away. Lao Wang I was wrong, Lao Wang I'll eat later, go away

dd: What did Xiao-laoshi eat today?
gg: I- You- I ate the stir-fried rice noodles Lao Wang bought for me.

gg: You're really getting less and less respectful of your elders.
dd: If you admit you're old, I'll respect you.
gg: I admit that I'm old.
dd: Well, I still don't respect you.

dd: You need a Switch
gg: Yes
dd: You need a Swtich, it will give you strength, you want it?
gg: Yeah
dd: You really want it?
gg: I want it
dd: Okay

dd: So cute, pouty mouth. I'm going to use this as our chat background.
gg: WYB, don't force me to use that one of yours, who doesn't have a tragic past?

gg: What exactly isn't forbidden in your family [the Lan sect]?
dd: You're not forbidden.

dd: Right, help me design a logo.
gg: You can share ideas with me, then I really can design a WYB logo for you.
dd: I need your help designing a leather [racing] suit.
gg: Leather suit? What leather suit?

gg: I never eat snacks.
dd: Bull, you just, you just ate one! Chocolate bar~ Isn't that right?
gg (sheepishly): Chocolate roll, chocolate roll

gg: Hi everyone, I'm Lao Wang
dd: I'm Lao Xiao
(to xz) Are you competing for cuteness? Then you've won~
(to wyb) No worries WYB, the future is long

(about xz) An old cow eating tender grass
[slang for older guy dating someone a lot younger]

dd: Thank you Zhan-ge for the helmet!
gg: No need for thanks~ As long as you're happy, Yibo-ge~
I hope my team will give me the chance to go skiing with Lao Wang

(one song to describe the other)
dd: Nan Hai ('Boy')
gg: Nian Shao You Wei ('The Young are Promising')
WYB!!! Does he have any flaws??? No!!!
I'm just Lan Wangji's body double

(about CQL)
真情实感。
Real emotions and honest feelings.
Xiao-laoshi's smile is very sweet, he's very similar to Wei Wuxian

(describing wyb)
Venus

dd: Zhan-ge
gg: Bo-di
dd: Zhan-ge
gg: Bo-di

gg: I must look very ugly, like this just now
dd: You look really good, there are no moments when Zhan-ge is ugly

dd: Who hits who?
gg: You hit me
dd (threateningly): Say it again
gg (weakly): I hit you
(to wyb) I wasn't looking at you! You're so attractive, I'm not even allowed to look at you?
No matter how good I look, I still won't be as photogenic as Xiao-laoshi!
The first time we met was TTXS

dd: Lao Xiao!
gg: Lao Wang!
dd: Lao Xiao!
gg: Lao Wang~
wyb is a monster~ today he sent me 5 portraits from his photoshoot, and asked me if he was handsome or not
Wei Wuxian~ Yiling Laozu~ Xiao Zhan!! Xiao Zhan!!! Zhan-ge~ Zhan-ge~ Zhan-ge!!! Xiao Zhan ah~~~
(pouting exaggeratedly) I didn't see Wangji for the entire day today

dd (hitting table as he speaks): Please! Give! Me! A! Chance!
gg (singing): Please give me a kiss~
dd: What?
gg (singing): Is it possible or not?
dd: Of course not.
dd: (hitting table) Please! Give! Me! A! Chance!
gg (singing): A kiss upon my face~

gg: That early? Going and returning the same day
dd: Cool
gg: Not cool at all
dd: Very cool
gg:Not cool at all
dd:Super cool

dd: You have hair stuck behind your mask
(gg steps forward & leans in so dd can fix it for him)
dd: Ok, not a problem anymore
gg: I wasn't going to thank you. (beep)

(after confirming w/ dd he's going somewhere very early then returning the same day)
gg (singing by himself): Love me, don't go~ If you say you don't love me~

dd: Who said it? You?
gg: Was it Wei Wuxian? Was it Wei Wuxian who said 'everyday'?
staff: Lan Zhan said it.

(talking about wwx running back & forth between fights in yi city)
gg: Like an idiot
dd: Very cute! Super cute!
gg (singing Avril Lavigne's Hello Kitty): Arigato gozaimas ka-ka-ka-kawaii~
dd: Super cute! Isn't it cute? Running back and forth, isn't it super cute?

dd (spreading fingers on gg's knee): Is it ticklish?
gg (shaking his head): I don't feel anything. What do you mean?
dd: Nothing
gg (spreading fingers over dd's knee): Ticklish? Even through your clothes?
(dd nods)

gg: Hurts. Don't massage (my neck) anymore, it hurts
dd: If it hurts, don't let cold wind blow at you anymore
gg: It hurts
dd: If your stomach hurts, you really can't let cold wind blow at you, really. Really.

Yang Xia (to dd): I'm never letting you drink again, you're bloated again today
dd: Pff, no, I'm not bloated
gg: Wait... (to Yang Xia) what did you just say? (disbelief) you all went to eat good food yesterday? (fake anger) Are you all even human? I'm very angry, I'm leaving
(dd's index finger moving slightly to graze the back of gg's hand when they were walking close together after taking pictures for the Duanwu Festival)

(rehearsing scene where wwx hides behind lwj from a dog)
gg: Lan Zhan, what are you doing? (pause) Your lips are so shiny
dd: Yours are too, okay

(gg playing with water leaking out of Suibian)
dd: Don't aim at my face
(gg continues to aim stream at dd's face)
dd: Why is your sword so good at peeing? (turns around)
gg: Lan Zhan, look! Lan Zhan! Look!

(gg singing RV's 'Bad Boy' and twirling his flute)
gg: You're so indifferent, Lan Zhan
(dd shrugs)
gg: If you're like this, I don't want to be forward anymore, it's tiring
dd: Too bad (censored) it's your style to be forward
gg: You! Such a tsundere
dd: I'm not

(dd complains about itchy mosquito bites on his face)
gg (to his assistant): Get the qingcao gao, please
gg (to dd): It's a little (indistinct), it's meant to soothe itchiness [...] apply a little

gg (to dd): So cold. (bites lip) My arm is already numb
(dd reaches out his hand)
gg (shakes head): It's okay

dd (to gg): Woah, so graceful. Don't you like it? So graceful. Woah, so ethereal, so ethereal. Ethereal.
gg: This clearly doesn't suit me
dd: Why isn't it suitable?
gg: Because it doesn't suit WWX
dd: I'm not talking about WWX, I'm talking about XZ~

dd: So many mosquitoes, super big!
gg: Mianhae mianhae hajima~
dd: I'll show you later
gg: No need
dd: Show you, show you
gg: No need
dd: Show you
gg: No
dd: Show you
gg: I said no need! YAH!
dd: SHOW YOU!
gg: YAH!

gg: Lao Wang, I know I was wrong
dd: If so then eat a bowl of wontons, eat two bowls
gg: I can't finish two bowls
dd: Then tomorrow and, today and tomorrow, tomorrow and the day after, eat two
gg: Okay okay, I'll eat
dd: Really? (smiles/laughs)
gg: Really

(while apologizing to dd for accidentally smacking him on the face, after agreeing to eat two bowls of wontons)
gg: I'll do whatever you want me to, okay, Lao Wang?
dd (laughing): I've profited!
gg: Profited? You (hits dd's arm) shouldn't say this kind of nonsense

(lotus pond boat scene, gg in dd's lap, dd's sleeve hit gg's face)
gg (sits up): Give you some space
dd: Give me some space
gg (singing) Give you some [space]~ Please give me a little more time~ A little more space~

dd: Yeah, for your mom and for your sister and for your girlfriend. Girl-girl friend
gg: Just girl friend
dd: Yeah, right now maybe just girl friend but
gg: Using your [bad English], what are you saying?
dd: You know, maybe next time, next time!

(WeChat for/four men)
dd: No, not everyday
gg: Wow, every day
dd: No
dd: Everyday is for work, every day is for work
gg: Me too
dd: No, because
(gg singing Rihanna's 'Work')
dd: I just
dd (softly): Listen
gg: Just friend okay? You have any friends? (curses in Korean)

gg: You always with, WeChat for/four... for/four... for/four men
dd: No
gg: For what?
dd: For... for work! Work
gg: Work? Work?
dd: Mm, yeah
gg: LIAR! Liar~ Liar~ Ok, ok, I, me too

(WeChat for/four men)
dd: Friend
gg: Friend
dd: Girl
gg: No, no, no
dd: Sister
gg: Work okay?
dd: Sister... for, for, for friend, for girl friend
gg: wyb is liar
dd: For
gg: You speak liar
dd: girl friend. for sister, for, yeah
gg: For my mom

gg: Princess carry, carry me
dd: No problem
gg: Carry me, carry me out of the water then start walking
[...]
gg: In a bit, suggest it to the director. Princess carry me up
dd: No problem
gg: Let's try it out on this side
dd: Boyfriend strength, no problem

(dd agreeing to princess carry gg out of the water, gg pulling him to the side to try it out)
dd: I have enough boyfriend strength
gg: Boyfriend strength, my ass
gg: This is a brotherly... drama. What are you thinking of, WYB? What are you thinking of?

dd: There's still 7 days, 7 days
gg: 7 days before you go?
dd: Should be
gg: How long will you be gone?
dd: 3 days
gg: (censored)
dd: Because it's rushed
gg: 3 days?
dd: 2 days? 3 days? Something like that

(after confirming dd would be gone for 2-3 days)
gg: gg: Ai~ (censored) Please don't go, I'm begging you~ If you leave, we can't finish filming. When you leave, they'll work me to death

gg: Sunbae, sunbae
dd: He cursed at me
gg: Sunbae
dd: Cursed at me
gg: Sunbae
dd (mouths): He cursed at me
gg: joesonghamnida, joesonghamnida, sunbae, joesonghamnida
dd: He cursed at me
gg: joesonghamnida, sunbae
dd: Cursed at me
gg: gawenchana? gwaenchanayo, sunbae?

(dd holding Bichen up to gg's neck while sitting on stairs)
gg: I'm tired today, I still need to film the first episode tomorrow
dd: Okay, I'll rely on you tomorrow Zhan-ge

(gg singing 'Only Love High Heels' [ref to dd wearing insoles to be taller than gg])
dd: Say you were wrong
gg: I was wrong
dd: Louder
gg: I was wrong
dd: Louder
gg: I was wrong

(boat bts)
gg: It's too hot, I'm sweaty
dd: It's not
gg: Your clothes are thin
dd: Ge, your clothes are too dark and thick
gg: Does your heart ache for me?
dd: My heart aches for you a lot, ge ;)
gg: This is how WYB treats me every day on set

gg: Let me off for today
dd: Be nicer to me, ok? Be nicer to me, be nicer to me
gg: Shut up

gg (pointing to dd): He cursed at me. Him, not me.
dd: The mic didn't even pick it up, stop pretending
gg: The huge camera doesn't lie
dd: I said 'LOVE YOU'
gg: LOVE YOU
dd: Yeah~
gg: You should have just cursed at me

(gg sitting on rooftop for a scene)
dd: Zhan-ge, do you know how dangerous it was for you just now? You could've fallen down. Don't move around so carelessly, okay?

(dd didn't have his insoled shoes)
dd: I'll get on my tiptoes then
gg: I'll 'ba' [spread legs out wide] a little
dd: Thank you, thank you ge~
gg: It's what I should do, Yibo-ge~
gg Lao Wang~
dd: Lao Xiao~
gg: LAO WANG!
dd: LAO XIAO!
gg: LAO WANG!!!
dd: LAO XIAO!!!

(talking abt interview where gg praised dd)
gg: So did I overly praise you again?
dd: What are you doing, praising me for no reason?
gg: They asked me! If they didn't ask, why would I praise you, do I have a problem?
gg: Ah, I was sincere about what I said
dd (grins): Really?

(about the way he praised dd in an interview)
gg: It's true, it's the truth, I think you're pretty good. Really very good, I really think you're very good
dd: I also think you're very good~ 
(bro handshake)
dd (to gg, about rainbow-farting the same way in interviews): 心有灵犀。Our hearts are in sync.

dd (to gg): You're super photogenic okay?
dd (to staff): He's SUPER photogenic, he's the most photogenic
dd (to gg): You're the most photogenic.

dd: That young actor that Zhan-ge worked with before...
gg (panicked face): I'm not close to him

(gg hurt his foot in the river and dd didn't realize at first)
gg: Why did you have to laugh?
dd: I'm sorry. I'm sorry Zhan-ge. Zhan-ge...

dd: Oh we can go take, take a bath
gg: (indistinct)
dd: Hm?
gg: Yes, we can bathe (indistinct)
staff: You can plan a hot bath
dd: Ge, how about it?
(dd putting his hand around gg's throat (TWICE) right in front of EVERYONE's hotpot)

(in the Xuanwu Cave, gg in a puffy jacket)
gg: wyb, be a little kinder to me, I'm already this miserable
dd: Take a picture
gg: I'm already this miserable
dd: Want to take a picture?
gg: Take a picture, my ass
dd: You look so sexy

gg: My bangs can breathe [are wispy]
dd (mouths): I really like it

(rehearsing scene in Xuanwu Cave where gg is sitting/leaning against the wall)
dd (leaning forward): Is this your foot?
gg: I'm beggig you, Yibo. Yibo-ge.

dd: You're a grown up but still let yourself get hungry?
gg: Sorry
dd: You're a 91-liner, how can you still let yourself get hungry?
gg: :(

(watching the take of Wangxian hilltop farewell)
gg: Let me see how he reminisced about me
gg: Wah~ This beautiful? It really looks good
gg: He got thinner. After he came back from Changsha he got really really thin.

(dd asking gg about how he looked on the hilltop farewell scene, even though gg is holding something bug-like to his face)
dd: Ai! Yah yah yah! Was it okay? Was it okay? Was it okay? I'm asking you
gg: Super handsome~

(eating dd's bday cake)
dd: You dare to eat that much Zhan-ge?
gg: Aren't we running tomorrow?
dd: We're really running?
gg: Ah? You're not running?
dd: I will I will I will I will I will

dd: Ok ok ok, 8:30, 8:30!
gg: I think I'll run at 9
dd: But I :'( You won't run with me at 8:30?
gg: Ok ok let's run let's run
dd: Which is it!
gg: Let me finish eating this taro (cake) first, it's really good
dd: Will you run at 8:30 or not?

(gg got distracted by taro cake)
dd: Are we running at 8:30 or not? Zhan-ge. Lao Xiao~!
gg: Ey!
dd (Chongqing dialect): Are you running or not?
gg: I'll run, I'll call you tomorrow morning?
dd: Will you run at 8:30~?
gg: I will I will I will!
